scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:html
scripts.build:css: postcss -u postcss-import -u postcss-css-variables -u postcss-custom-media -u postcss-custom-selectors -u postcss-calc -u autoprefixer autoprefixer.browsers 'last 3 versions' autoprefixer.cascade false -u postcss-reporter --postcss-reporter.clearMessages true -u csswring --sourcemap -o build/assets/css/style.css src/assets/css/style.css
scripts.build:html: htmlmin -o build/index.html src/index.html && htmlmin -o build/about-me.html src/about-me.html
scripts.lint:css: postcss -u stylelint -q -u postcss-bem-linter --postcss-bem-linter.preset 'suit' --postcss-bem-linter.ignoreSelectors html. -u postcss-reporter --postcss-reporter.clearMessages true --dir build/assets/lint src/assets/css/**/*.css
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:html'
scripts.watch:js: watch 'npm run lint:js && npm run build:js' src/assets/javascript --wait 3
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run move:assets
